file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-24-02-04 - CMU PRINTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL CMU PRINTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the CMU printer. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 23-24-02-000-801-A CMU PRINTER - REMOVAL AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 23-24-02-400-801-A CMU PRINTER - INSTALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 23-24-02 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-24-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 2. CMU PRINTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the CMU printer. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223/224 Cockpit C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the CMU PRT circuit breaker and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it (Location Tip: 115 V AC/CMU PTR). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disengage the Dzus (2) fasteners at the CMU printer (3). (2) Move the printer (2) away from its location on the control pedestal to get access to the electrical connector (1). (3) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-24-02 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU CMU Printer - Removal/Installation Figure 401 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 23-24-02 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-24-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH CMU 3. CMU PRINTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the CMU printer. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-22-02-700-801-A/500 ACARS PRINTER - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223/224 Cockpit D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Connect the cable connector (1) to the printer connector. (2) Move the printer (3) to its location on the control pedestal. (3) Engage the Dzus (2) fasteners at the printer (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the CMU PRT circuit breaker and remove the DO- NOT-CLOSE tag from it (Location Tip: 115 V AC/CMU PTR). (2) Do the CMU printer operational test ( AMM TASK 23-22-02-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 23-24-02 Page 4 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
